cards.rules_text:
First strike, Deathtouch
{3}, {T}, CT-9904, Crosshair deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
The Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Haste, Trample
Whenever CT-9903, Wrecker deals combat damage to a player, create that many tapped colorless artifact token named Meteorite with “When this token enters, it deals 2 damage to any target” and “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Sacrifice a Meteorite: CT-9903, Wrecker deals 5 damage to any target. Activate only once each turn.
Bad Batch[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{X}, {T}: Gain control of target artifact an opponent controls with mana value X or less.
Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Vigilance
{1}, {T}: Name a card. Target player reveals the top of their library. If the named card is revealed, exile it. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any time can be spent to cast that spell.
Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Omega, of The Bad Batch has all activated abilities and keyword abilities of Clone-Trooper creatures that you control.
Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Persist [i](When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)[/i]
{U}, {T}: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. At the beginning of that player's next end step, they discard that card.
The Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Creatures you control are goaded.
Whenever another creature you control dies, you may reveal the top card of your library until you reveal a creature with the same creature type as it. Put that card into your hand, and the rest at the bottom of your library in a random order.
Master [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

Flash, Vigilance
Obi-Wan Kenobi costs {1} less for each creature attacking you or a planeswalker you control. 
When Obi-Wan Kenobi enters the battlefield, it gains indestructible until the beginning of the next end step.
Master [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

Flash, Reach, Trample, Indestructible
Protection from instants and sorceries
The Zillo Beast costs {1} less for each time a land has entered or left the graveyard this turn.

Vigilance
Whenever ARC Troopers attacks, up to one target creature has base power 1 until the end of combat.

Reveal the top card of your library until you've revealed a creature card with mana values 1, 2, and 3. Put the first creature of each mana value onto the battlefield tapped, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Exile Brothers in Arms.

First strike, Haste
When Anakin Skywalker, Fallen dies, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
Master [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]
Each other creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to target creature that player controls.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The remaining Jedi will be hunted down and defeated!” —Darth Sidious[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace, First strike
Double all damage Lord Vader would deal.
Whenever Lord Vader attacks, it gains Indestructible.

Reveal the top card of your library until you've revealed a creature card with mana values 1, 2, and 3. Put the first creature of each mana value onto the battlefield tapped, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Exile Brothers in Arms.

Reveal the top card of your library until you've revealed a creature card with mana values 1, 2, and 3. Put the first creature of each mana value onto the battlefield tapped, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Exile Brothers in Arms.

[i]Join Forces [/i]— Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana.
Each opponent creates X 1/1 colorless B1-Battledroid artifact tokens with Assault, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way plus 1. [i](Creatures with Assault must attack if able and attacks you if able.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, if each opponent does not control a creature named B1-Battledroid, exile The Clone Wars, then cast it transformed.
cards.notes: Flips into Rise of the First Galactic Empire

cards.rules_text: When Battle Brothers enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 Clone Trooper creature token.
Christophsis enters the battlefield tapped. When Christophsis enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Christophsis.
Scarif enters the battlefield tapped. When Scarif enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Scarif.
Mustafar enters the battlefield tapped. When Mustafar enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Mustafar.
Kashyyyk enters the battlefield tapped. When Kashyyyk enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Kashyyyk.
Nal Hutta enters the battlefield tapped. When Nal Hutta enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Nal Hutta.
Crait enters the battlefield tapped. When Crait enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Crait.
Dagobah enters the battlefield tapped. When Dagobah enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Dagobah.
Bureau of Standards enters the battlefield tapped. When Bureau of Standards enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Bureau of Standards.
Onderon enters the battlefield tapped. When Onderon enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Onderon.
Coruscant enters the battlefield tapped. When Coruscant enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Coruscant.

Piloting {1}{U} [i](If you cast this card for its piloting cost, it's an Aura enchantment spell with enchant vehicle. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached.)[/i]
Enchanted vehicle is a creature.
R2-D2, Full of Solutions and enchanted vehicle gain +1/0 for each basic land among basic land types you control.

Piloting {2}{R}{R} [i](If you cast this card for its piloting cost, it's an Aura enchantment spell with enchant vehicle. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached.)[/i]
First strike, Haste
Whenever enchanted vehicle attacks, it gains the stats and keyword abilities of BB-8 and all creatures that pilot it.

Omega, of The Bad Batch has all activated abilities and keyword abilities of Clone-Trooper creatures that you control.
Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Squad {1} [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {1} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
Your deck may include any number of B1-Battledroid Squads.

Squad {2} [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
When Clone-Trooper Squad enters the battlefield, put a vigilance, first strike, or haste counter on each Clone-Trooper creature you control.

Squad {1}{R} [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {1}{R} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
When B2-Battledroid Squad enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Your deck may include any number of B2-Battledroid Squad.

Flying
When Advanced ReConnaissance-170 enters the battlefield, create a white 2/2 Clone Trooper creature token.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

When BX-Commando Droid enters the battlefield, name a nonland card. Target opponent reveals their hand. That player discards all cards with that name. If they can't you may tap target artifact or creature instead.

Double strike
Coordinate: Whenever Ahsoka Tano, Jedi Ronin deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. [i](Gain this ability ability while you control 3 or more units.)[/i]
Apprentice [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

cards.card_name: Rise of the First Galactic Empire
cards.rules_text: You get an emblem with “Whenever you would create a Clone Trooper creature token, create a 3/1 white Stormtrooper creature token with menace and intimidate instead.” [i](That creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)[/i]

Defender
[i]Live for One's People[/i] ― {T}: Remove target attacking creature from combat. Both you and its controller draw a card and gain 1 life.

Creatures your opponents control lose shroud and can't gain or have shroud.
Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Piloting {2}{U}{R} [i](If you cast this card for its piloting cost, it's an Aura enchantment spell with enchant vehicle. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached.)[/i]
Haste, Prowess
Enchanted vehicle has +1/+1, haste, and prowess.
